mapper.select: SELECT n4.store_uid, n4.store_type, n4.store_name, n2.reservation_start, n2.reservation_end, n2.reservation_count, n2.reservation_price, n2.reservation_seat FROM NMJ_reservation n2, NMJ_store n4 WHERE #{mb_uid} = n2.mb_uid AND n4.store_uid = n2.store_uid AND n2.reservation_check = 1;
SELECT n2. store_uid, n2.store_name, n2.store_type FROM NMJ_member n1, NMJ_store n2, NMJ_like n3 WHERE #{mb_uid} = n3.mb_uid AND n2.store_uid = n3.store_uid;
SELECT n2.reply_content, n3.review_content, n2.reply_date, n2.reply_uid FROM NMJ_member n1, NMJ_reply n2, NMJ_review n3 WHERE #{mb_uid} = n2.mb_uid AND n2.review_uid = n3.review_uid;
